title: 030 Show Current Location in a Google Map
Here is a full Activity class that places a Marker at the current location, and also moves the camera to the current position.

inline_content.Text: Here is a full Activity class that places a Marker at the current location, and also moves the camera to the current position.

title:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">

    <fragment xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
        xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
        xmlns:map="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:id="@+id/map"
        tools:context="com.example.app.MapLocationActivity"
        android:name="com.google.android.gms.maps.SupportMapFragment"/>

</LinearLayout>

content_resolved.code:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">

    <fragment xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
        xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
        xmlns:map="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:id="@+id/map"
        tools:context="com.example.app.MapLocationActivity"
        android:name="com.google.android.gms.maps.SupportMapFragment"/>

</LinearLayout>
